#summary OpenWrt firmware building for HiWiFi router (tw150v1)

= OpenWrt firmware building for HiWiFi router (tw150v1) =

Add your content here.


Requirements:
1. Please choose Ubuntu 12.04 to do this.
2. Make sure the host has Internet connection.

Steps:
1. Checkout our scripts and source code:
   svn checkout https://openwrt-hiwifi.googlecode.com/svn/trunk openwrt-hiwifi
2. Build:
   cd openwrt-hiwifi
   make

openwrt-tw150v1-recovery.bin is the HiWiFi formatted firmware.
